com.ebay.lightning.core.services

Class TaskExecutionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ebay.lightning.core.services.TaskExecutionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskExecutionService

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class TaskExecutionServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskExecutionService
    The TaskExecutionServiceImpl provides the implementation for TaskExecutionService that defines the operations for processing the request and getting the response. Most of the operation are delegated to TaskExecutionManager.
    Author:
    shashukla
    See Also:
    TaskExecutionServiceImpl, TaskExecutionManager

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        public void submit(LightningRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionService
        Submit a request to get executed asynchronously at high speed. The request should contain the ReservationReceipt returned by the TaskExecutionService.reserve(int) call.
        Specified by:
        submit in interface TaskExecutionService
        Parameters:
        request - contains the list of Task and configuration to execute

      • pollResponse

        public LightningResponse pollResponse(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                      boolean pollDeltaOnly)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionService
        Poll the current execution state for the request submitted by #TaskExecutionService.submit(LightningRequest) method. This method id helpful to check if the request has completed.
        Specified by:
        pollResponse in interface TaskExecutionService
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the LightningRequest
        pollDeltaOnly - get full if true and delta response if false
        Returns:
        LightningResponse that has the current state of task execution

      • reserve

        public ReservationReceipt reserve(int load)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionService
        Check for bandwidth to make reservation for the specified load.
        Specified by:
        reserve in interface TaskExecutionService
        Parameters:
        load - the load to check for reservation
        Returns:
        the reservation receipt containing either of the state ACCEPTED, DENIED, BUSY

      • getReport

        public LightningRequestReport getReport(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Description copied from interface: TaskExecutionService
        Get the detailed execution report for the request. This method is usually called after checking if the request is completed by calling TaskExecutionService.pollResponse(String, boolean)
        Specified by:
        getReport in interface TaskExecutionService
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the LightningRequest
        Returns:
        LightningRequestReport that has the detailed execution report of the request
